1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | A portable relational calculator.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain
6  ( koshuMain
7    -- * koshu.hs
8    -- $koshu.hs
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture                 as O
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.System                   as O
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Type                     as T
15import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data                     as D
16import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                     as C
17import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Writer                   as W
18import qualified Koshucode.Baala.System.CliParser         as Z
19import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Element  as L
20import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Run      as L
21
22{- $koshu.hs
23  
24   @koshu@ command is implemented using 'koshuMain'.
25  
26   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                     as B
27   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core                     as C
28   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Global   as Gl
29   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Version  as Ver
30   > import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Main.KoshuMain   as Main
31   > 
32   > main :: IO ()
33   > main = B.exitWith =<< Main.koshuMain koshuGlobal
34   > 
35   > koshuGlobal :: C.GlobalC
36   > koshuGlobal = Gl.baalaGlobal
37   >               { C.globalSynopsis  = "The Koshucode Baala Implementation"
38   >               , C.globalVersion   = Ver.version }
39-}
40
41-- ----------------------  Parameter
42
43data Param c = Param
44    { paramAutoOutput    :: Bool
45    , paramElement       :: Bool
46    , paramWriter        :: C.ResultWriter c
47    , paramLiner         :: [B.Bz]
48    , paramPretty        :: Bool
49    , paramRun           :: Bool
50    , paramShowEncoding  :: Bool
51    , paramStdin         :: Bool
52    , paramOutput        :: Maybe FilePath
53    , paramHelp          :: Bool
54    , paramVersion       :: Bool
55
56    , paramProg          :: String
57    , paramArgs          :: [String]
58    , paramProxy         :: [(String, Maybe String)]
59    , paramNow           :: T.Time
60    } deriving (Show)
61
62initParam :: (Show c, D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => Z.Parsed -> IO (Param c)
63initParam (Left errs) = O.putFailure $ concat errs
64initParam (Right (z, args)) =
65    do (prog, _) <- B.progAndArgs
66       proxy     <- L.getProxies
67       now       <- currentTime
68       return $ Param { paramAutoOutput    = getFlag "auto-output"
69                      , paramElement       = getFlag "element"
70                      , paramWriter        = writer
71                      , paramLiner         = map B.stringBz liner
72                      , paramPretty        = getFlag "pretty"
73                      , paramRun           = getFlag "run"
74                      , paramShowEncoding  = getFlag "show-encoding"
75                      , paramStdin         = getFlag "stdin"
76                      , paramOutput        = getLast "output"
77                      , paramHelp          = getFlag "help"
78                      , paramVersion       = getFlag "version"
79
80                      , paramProg          = prog
81                      , paramArgs          = args
82                      , paramProxy         = proxy
83                      , paramNow           = now }
84    where
85      getFlag  = Z.getFlag z
86      getReq   = Z.getReq  z
87      getLast  = Z.getReqLast z
88
89      assertX  = getReq "assert-x"
90
91      liner  | null assertX = map oneLiner $ getReq "liner"
92             | otherwise    = ["|== X : add /x ( " ++ concat assertX ++ " )"]
93
94      writer | getFlag "csv"            = W.resultCsv
95             | getFlag "csv-heading"    = W.resultCsvHeading
96             | getFlag "tsv-heading"    = W.resultTsvHeading
97             | getFlag "dump"           = C.resultDump
98             | getFlag "geojson"        = W.resultGeoJson
99             | getFlag "html-compact"   = W.resultHtmlCompact
100             | getFlag "html-indented"  = W.resultHtmlIndented
101             | getFlag "json"           = W.resultJson
102             | getFlag "tab"            = W.resultKoshuTab
103             | otherwise                = W.resultKoshu
104
105      -- replace "||" to "\n"
106      oneLiner :: O.StringMap
107      oneLiner []               = []
108      oneLiner ('|' : '|' : xs) = '\n' : oneLiner (O.trimBegin xs)
109      oneLiner (x : xs)         = x : oneLiner xs
110
111      currentTime = case D.stringTime $ unwords $ getReq "now" of
112                      Right t -> return t
113                      Left _  -> T.nowZoned
114
115
116-- ----------------------  Main
117
118help :: [String]
119help =
120    [ "DESCRIPTION"
121    , "  This is a relational data processor in Koshucode."
122    , "  Koshucode is a notation for people and computers"
123    , "  who read, write, and calculate relational data."
124    , ""
125    , "EXAMPLES"  -- TYPICAL USAGES
126    , "  koshu CALC.k DATA1.k DATA2.k   Calculate using CALC.k"
127    , "                                 for input DATAn.k"
128    , "  koshu -i CALC.k < DATA.k       Read input data from"
129    , "                                 standard input"
130    , ""
131    ]
132
133options :: [Z.Option]
134options =
135    [ Z.help
136    , Z.version
137    , Z.req  "x" ["assert-x"] "EXPR"         "|== X : add /x ( EXPR )"
138    , Z.flag ""  ["auto-output"]             "Automatic output when no assertions"
139    , Z.flag ""  ["csv"]                     "CSV output with judgement"
140    , Z.flag ""  ["csv-heading"]             "CSV output with heading"
141    , Z.flag ""  ["dump"]                    "Dump internal data"
142    , Z.flag ""  ["element"]                 "Analize input code"
143    , Z.flag ""  ["geojson"]                 "GeoJSON output"
144    , Z.flag ""  ["html-indented", "html"]   "HTML output with indent"
145    , Z.flag ""  ["html-compact"]            "HTML output without indent"
146    , Z.flag ""  ["json"]                    "JSON output"
147    , Z.req  ""  ["liner"] "CODE"            "One liner"
148    , Z.req  ""  ["now"] "CODE"              "Set system time"
149    , Z.req  "o" ["output"] "FILE.k"         "Output file"
150    , Z.flag ""  ["pretty"]                  "Pretty print"
151    , Z.flag ""  ["run"]                     "Run input code"
152    , Z.flag ""  ["show-encoding"]           "Show character encoding"
153    , Z.flag "i" ["stdin"]                   "Read from stdin"
154    , Z.flag ""  ["tab"]                     "Tab-separated output"
155    , Z.flag ""  ["tsv-heading"]             "TSV output with heading"
156    ]
157
158-- | The main function for @koshu@ command.
159--   See 'Koshucode.Baala.Toolkit.Library.Global.baalaRops'
160--   for default argument.
161koshuMain :: (D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => C.Global c -> IO B.ExitCode
162koshuMain g = Z.parseCommand options >>= initParam >>= koshuMainParam g
163
164koshuMainParam :: (D.CContent c, W.ToJSON c) => C.Global c -> Param c -> IO B.ExitCode
165koshuMainParam g@C.Global { C.globalResult  = rslt
166                          , C.globalFeature = feat
167                          , C.globalHook    = res }
168               p
169    | paramHelp p          = O.putSuccess $ Z.helpMessage help options
170    | paramVersion p       = O.putSuccessLn ver
171    | paramShowEncoding p  = O.putSuccessLn =<< B.currentEncodings
172    | paramElement p       = putElems   g2 src
173    | otherwise            = L.runFiles g2 src
174    where
175      ver   = C.globalSynopsis g ++ " " ++ C.globalVersionText g
176      src   = B.ioPointTogether (paramStdin p) (paramLiner p) (paramArgs p)
177
178      -- global parameter
179      g2 = C.globalFill g
180           { C.globalFeature   = feat { C.featAutoOutput = paramAutoOutput p }
181           , C.globalResult    = rslt { C.resultWriter = paramWriter p }
182           , C.globalProgram   = paramProg  p
183           , C.globalArgs      = paramArgs  p
184           , C.globalProxy     = paramProxy p
185           , C.globalTime      = paramNow   p
186           , C.globalHook      = altMaybe resOutputAlt (paramOutput p) res }
187
188-- | Alter output of data resource.
189resOutputAlt :: FilePath -> O.Map (C.Resource c)
190resOutputAlt path res = res { C.resOutput = B.ioPoint path }
191
192-- | Alter only if 'Just' value is given.
193altMaybe :: (a -> b -> b)         -- ^ Pure alteration
194         -> (Maybe a -> b -> b)   -- ^ Maybe alteration
195altMaybe _ (Nothing) b  = b
196altMaybe f (Just a)  b  = f a b
197
198putElems :: (D.CContent c) => C.Global c -> [B.IOPoint] -> IO B.ExitCode
199putElems g ns =
200    do (abres, _) <- C.resRead g ns
201       res2 <- B.abortLeft abres
202       res3 <- B.abortLeft $ C.assembleRelmap res2
203       putStrLn "-*- koshu -*-"
204       putStrLn ""
205       W.putJudgesWith (O.exitCode 0) $ L.resourceElem res3
206
